h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: You'll have to take the outside path to proceed further, but be ready for the beguiling chant to reveal two more Lantern Sentries that patrol this section, and take them out carefully when their backs are turned.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
You'll have to take the outside path to proceed further, but be ready for the beguiling chant to reveal two more Lantern Sentries that patrol this section, and take them out carefully when their backs are turned.
